data.text:
@thedenz89 Hi Denzil, we're sorry to hear you had this experience. We work hard to get you to your destination safely and on time. However, flights may be delayed due to circumstances beyond our control.
We have passed on your feedback to our team so that we can work on improving

@Monkish22 Hi Ameena, we're every concerned to hear this. Could you kindly reach out to our Baggage Department so that we can check on this for you? Please see our contact numbers here: https://t.co/JinMfn3Ztd.

We're looking forward to hearing from you to resolve this.

@CorinBailey thanks for letting us know. We're unsure why you were unable to get on to our Reservations Department as we are available daily from 7.00a.m – 8.00p.m. We'll happily enquire into what happened to ensure that it is rectified. Is there something we can assist with?
@CorinBailey we're truly sorry to hear you say this! Which Department were you trying to get in contact with?
